```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide', message='FALSE'}
source("../../../rhelpers/knitr_setup.R")
```

----

The function provided in `NCStats` is `levenesTest()` (note the `s` on `levenes`) rather than the `leveneTest()` provided by the `car` package.  So, make sure to include the `s`.
